capability.name: Market Information Management
capability.definition: Market information management consolidates and improves market information from multiple sources in order to build up a bank knowledge base in targeted areas
capability.role: Consolidate market information from multiple sources and in any suitable media/format in order to build a bank financial market knowledge-base. The service domain activities include maintaining, refining, qualifying/verifying and presenting information in order to improve the quality of the available market intelligence within the bank
capability.example: The bank consolidates multiple sources of private company merger and acquisition activity in order to maintain a view of private company players in a target sector

key_features.name: Determine the required scope of market information to be maintained
key_features.description: Enables determine the required scope of market information to be maintained to support market information management consolidates and improves market information from multiple sources in order to build up a bank knowledge base in targeted areas

key_features.name: Source suitable market information sources and consolidate records
key_features.description: Enables source suitable market information sources and consolidate records to support market information management consolidates and improves market information from multiple sources in order to build up a bank knowledge base in targeted areas

key_features.name: Verify and qualify the accuracy of the information
key_features.description: Enables verify and qualify the accuracy of the information to support market information management consolidates and improves market information from multiple sources in order to build up a bank knowledge base in targeted areas

key_features.name: Structure/present the information in reports suited to business analysis and review
key_features.description: Enables structure/present the information in reports suited to business analysis and review to support market information management consolidates and improves market information from multiple sources in order to build up a bank knowledge base in targeted areas
